description:
This project was created to help the developers work with the Asp.Net MCV and Telerik MVC Grid coupled with some mapping technique between the Entities and ViewModels.

If you're one of us, you have to use the CustomBinding to query the database, reporting the criteria for sort, group and filter the income data, and then convert back the result to the ViewModels.

Sounds simple, but can become a very complicated and repetitive task.

So I, with the help of some comrades of development, have created a way to automate this in a very generic way.

Before using this, some observations;

This code is highly experimental and has no guarantee that works perfectly in all cases.
It was developed on top of NHibernate, but could works with another ORM tool3 - .
Credits and other informationâ€™s here: [to-do]
If you prefer, you can find the package Nuget here: [to-do].

That's it for now, I hope you enjoy.

Sorry for my bad (auto-translated) English.
releaseNotes:
Avoid double sorting the same member if the grouping for that member is enabled.
**Please send some feedback.
